  • Uses of ClassTransform in jdk.internal.classfile.components

    Subinterfaces of ClassTransform in jdk.internal.classfile.components
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    ClassRemapper
    ClassRemapper is a ClassTransform, FieldTransform, MethodTransform and CodeTransform deeply re-mapping all class references in any form, according to given map or map function.
